mapper.select: SELECT STREMPLOYEEID AS strEmployeeid, STRLOGINNAME AS strLoginname, STRPASSWORD AS strPassword, STRHEADPORTRAIT AS strHeadportrait, STRREALNAME AS strRealname, STRMOBILE AS strMobile, INTSTATUS AS intStatus, STRDUTYID AS strDutyid, STRMERCHANTID AS strMerchantid FROM tb_employee WHERE STRLOGINNAME=#{strLoginname}
